page.title: 08The museum in brook
page.content: Brook museum was built in the fourteenth century.In side it is all wooden beams made of solid oak.The oak beam were slotted together like a jigsaw. It was mainly used to store crops all farmers had to give a tenth of thier crops to the monks. Inside there is alsorts of things this is just some of them ;there was a land mesuring wheel,300 revolution equals one mile.There was a dairy area with a cheese press milk churn there was an old wheel 1meter 43 centimeters high and wide. The oast house was built in the nineenth century and now it is used as an oast house museum.
